channel.title: Little Prince on Wanderer Demo Stie
channel.description: Recent content in Little Prince on Wanderer Demo Stie

item.title: Chapter I
item.description: Once when I was six years old I saw a magnificent picture in a book, called True Stories from Nature, about the primeval forest. It was a picture of a boa constrictor in the act of swallowing an animal. Here is a copy of the drawing. Boa In the book it said: “Boa constrictors swallow their prey whole, without chewing it. After that they are not able to move, and they sleep through the six months that they need for digestion.
